metadata.title: CVE-2025-21698 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "usb: gadget: u_serial: Disable ep before setting port to null tofix the crash caused by port being null"This reverts commit 13014969cbf07f18d62ceea40bd8ca8ec9d36cec.It is reported to cause crashes on Tegra systems, so revert it for now.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
